body: For example, if there's images or something loading in the background, you can't vote or comment at all, you have to wait until it's finished. It seems the JS to process these events loads last, which I definitely think should be changed.
body_html: For example, if there's images or something loading in the background, you can't vote or comment at all, you have to wait until it's finished. It seems the JS to process these events loads last, which I definitely think should be changed.
title: Most functions, including comments and voting, do not work until every element of a page is fully loaded.

body: That's asking a lot of a potato.
body_html: That's asking a lot of a potato.
